page.title: 18THE SUPERNATURAL IN MIDHURST
page.content: The original Cowdray House was built in 152O by Sir David Owen.Next to build onto the house was Sir William Fitz-William.It was then sold and completed by Sir Anthony Brown who became Lord Montague.A prioress put a curse on the house and family,the curse of fire and water.When the fire occured the family was away but the house and contents were destroyed.Two weeks later Sir Anthony Brown was drowned.The curse was fulfilled.A grey lady,believed to be the prioress, walks through the woods at night. Both the Angel and Spread Eagle hotels are alleged to be haunted,the Angel by one ghost and the Spread Eagle by two. None of the local ghosts appear to be harmful.
